ValidationRule.description: Prevent users from changing Stage 'Closed-Site Survey Rejected' to any other except 'Signed Awaiting Site Survey Approval'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), (Text(PRIORVALUE(StageName)) = 'Closed - Site Survey Rejected'), NOT((Text(StageName)='Signed Awaiting Survey Approval')), CASESAFEID( RecordTypeId ) <> $Setup.Field_Service_Settings__c.Opportunity_RecordType_Frequency_Change__c )
